/**
 * Formatting utility functions
 *//**
 * Calculate progress percentage
 */export function calculateProgress(completed,total){if(total===0)return 0;return Math.round(completed/total*100);}/**
 * Format a number with commas for thousands
 */export function formatNumber(num){return num.toLocaleString();}/**
 * Pluralize a word based on count
 */export function pluralize(count,singular,plural){return count===1?singular:plural||"".concat(singular,"s");}
